sentences: Ettepanekuid oli mitu; peatuma jäi valikut neist viimasele.
Uurimisteemat otsides jäi ta peatuma kodukoha minevikule.
Noormees jäi peatuma mehhanisaatori elukutse juurde.
context: The Estonian word 'valikut' is the partitive case form of the noun 'valik', which means choice or selection. It appears in contexts where one makes a decision among multiple options. In the dictionary definition, it's used in the phrase 'peatuma jäädi valikut neist viimasele' meaning 'we chose to stop at/choose from among those last ones'. The partitive case indicates an incomplete action or selection process.
